title: WSB's Weekend Bite: David Alton Clark Is Buying AT&T Stock After The Earnings
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: This week we're joined by David Alton Clark, also known on Seeking Alpha as "The Winter Warrior," to discuss why he's buying AT&T stock after earnings, and get his thoughts on the semiconductor bill passing through legislative hurdles. Plus, Daniel covers upcoming earnings and economic events to watch for next week!"
content:encoded: This week we're joined by David Alton Clark, also known on Seeking Alpha as "The Winter Warrior," to discuss why he's buying AT&T stock after earnings, and get his thoughts on the semiconductor bill passing through legislative hurdles. Plus, Daniel covers upcoming earnings and economic events to watch for next week!"
